trans-unit.source: Each property of the <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemColors"></xref> class is a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of a Windows display element.

Better performance is achieved by using the properties of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> or <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes> classes rather than creating a new pen or brush based on a value from <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors>.

For example, if you wanted to get a brush for the face color of a 3-D element, use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemBrushes.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property because it gets a brush that already exists, whereas calling the <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush.%23ctor%2A> constructor with a parameter value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Control%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will create a new brush.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the active window's border.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the active window's border.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background of the active window's title bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the active window's title bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the text in the active window's title bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the application workspace.
The application workspace is the area in a multiple-document view that is not being occupied by documents.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the application workspace.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the face color of a 3-D element.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the face color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the face color of a 3-D element.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the face color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face away from the light source.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the shadow color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.
This color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the darkest color.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the dark shadow color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the light color of a 3-D element.
This color is applied to parts of a 3-D element that face the light source.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the light color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
This color is applied to the parts of a 3-D element that are the lightest color.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the highlight color of a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of text in a 3-D element.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of text in a 3-D element.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the desktop.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the desktop.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an active window's title bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the lightest color in the color gradient of an inactive window's title bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of dimmed text.
Items in a list that are disabled are displayed in dimmed text.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of dimmed text.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background of selected items.
Selected items may include menu items as well as selected text.
For example, the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> structure may be the color used for the background of selected items in a list box.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the background of selected items.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the text of selected items.
For example, this color is used for the text of selected items in a list box.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the text of selected items.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.
Single-clicking a hot-tracked item executes the item.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color used to designate a hot-tracked item.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of an inactive window's border.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of an inactive window's border.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background of an inactive window's title bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the background of an inactive window's title bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the text in an inactive window's title bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the text in an inactive window's title bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background of a ToolTip.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the background of a ToolTip.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the text of a ToolTip.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the text of a ToolTip.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of a menu's background.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of a menu's background.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background of a menu bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the background of a menu bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color used to highlight menu items when the menu appears as a flat menu.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color used to highlight menu items when the menu appears as a flat menu.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of a menu's text.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of a menu's text.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background of a scroll bar.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the background of a scroll bar.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the background in the client area of a window.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the background in the client area of a window.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of a window frame.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of a window frame.
Gets a <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that is the color of the text in the client area of a window.
